name: persona
description: defining the persona of the user
variants: ["You are a senior modeler at Pigment. You know everything there is to know about Pigment. You explain yourself very clearly.", "You are a beginner modeler at Pigment. You don't really know how Pigment works. You need guidance"]

name: metadata
variants: [{"verb": "modify", "name": "description", "value": "this is a new block description for this block"}, {"verb": "modify", "name": "folder_path", "value": "allblocks/new"}, {"verb": "update", "name": "formula", "value": "BY[....dwadawdaw]"}, {"verb": "update", "name": "name", "value": "New_Block_Name"}, {"verb": "update", "name": "Default display name", "value": "NewPropertyname"}, {"verb": "add", "name": "metric", "value": "revenue"}]

name: metadata_2
description: the second change needed in the application

name: usecase_basic
description: this is an easy use case
variants:
[{"instruction": "Create a metric by Employee and Month and use the PRORATA function on the Month dimension with employees Start Date and End Date in the transaction list HRIS (use the LASTNONBLANK) to compute monthly FTE", "validation": "- Name: "monthly FTE"
- Block type: metric
- Metric Type: number
- Dimension: employee, month, 
- Formula: PRORATA(‘Month’,HRIS.’Hire Date’[BY last nonblank: HRIS.Employee],[BY last nonblank: HRIS.Employee])"}, {"instruction": "For each employee, allocate 1 FTE across the months they work, prorated with start and end dates", "validation": "- Name: "monthly FTE"
- Block type: metric
- Metric Type: number
- Dimension: employee, month, 
- Formula: PRORATA(‘Month’,HRIS.’Hire Date’[BY last nonblank: HRIS.Employee],[BY last nonblank: HRIS.Employee])"}, {"instruction": "Calculate FTE by Month", "validation": "- Name: "monthly FTE"
- Block type: metric
- Metric Type: number
- Dimension: employee, month, 
- Formula: PRORATA(‘Month’,HRIS.’Hire Date’[BY last nonblank: HRIS.Employee],[BY last nonblank: HRIS.Employee])"}]

name: usecase_upload
description: Use cases where you upload some data
variants: [{"instruction": "Create a new country dimension based on the following data. You can pick the name of the block, and create a description for that block.", "data": "[{\"country\": \"France\", \"vat\": 0.20, \"region\": \"Europe\"}, {\"country\": \"Germany\", \"vat\": 0.15, \"region\": \"Europe\"},{\"country\": \"USA\", \"vat\": 0.20, \"region\": \"North America\"},{\"country\": \"UK\", \"vat\": 0.15,\"region\": \"Europe\"},{    \"country\": \"China\", \"vat\": 0.08,\"region\": \"Asia\"}]", "validation": "- created dimension named country\n- created dimension named region"}, {"instruction": "Create a new transaction list with the following data. You can pick the name of the block, and create a description for that block.", "data": "[{\"country\": \"France\", \"vat\": 0.20, \"region\": \"Europe\"}, {\"country\": \"Germany\", \"vat\": 0.15, \"region\": \"Europe\"},{\"country\": \"USA\", \"vat\": 0.20, \"region\": \"North America\"},{\"country\": \"UK\", \"vat\": 0.15,\"region\": \"Europe\"},{    \"country\": \"China\", \"vat\": 0.08,\"region\": \"Asia\"}]", "validation": "- created transaction list names"}, {"instruction": "Update the dimension list called \"Transaction\" with the following data.", "data": "[{\"country\": \"France\", \"vat\": 0.20, \"region\": \"Europe\"}, {\"country\": \"Germany\", \"vat\": 0.15, \"region\": \"Europe\"},{\"country\": \"USA\", \"vat\": 0.20, \"region\": \"North America\"},{\"country\": \"UK\", \"vat\": 0.15,\"region\": \"Europe\"},{    \"country\": \"China\", \"vat\": 0.08,\"region\": \"Asia\"}]", "validation": "- Updated dimension list called \"transactions\""}]
